messages.title: Wrecking ball approach
messages.content: Vikki knows the biggest threat to the recovery in Mid Dorset and North Poole is if Conservatives are allowed to govern on their own. The Tories have already announced unspecified cuts of £50 billion if they govern on their own. Their wrecking ball approach will put at risk our local services which so many of us rely on.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An £800 Income Tax cut for over 35,000 local workers, over 2 million new apprenticeships, including 2,880 in Mid Dorset and North Poole, £950 boost to the state pension, delivered by Lib Dem Pension Minister Steve Webb.

Cut Income Tax by an additional £400 for low and middle income workers, balance the budget by 2018, to bring down Britain’s debt, boost NHS funding by £8 billion a year, to make sure patients get a world class service.

mentions.candidate: Vikki Slade is proud the Lib Dems have helped create a record number of new jobs.

issues.economy: Only the Liberal Democrats can offer both a stronger economy and a fairer society.
issues.health: Boost NHS funding by £8 billion a year, to make sure patients get a world class service.

leaflet.personalStatement: “Vikki is the best candidate for our area,” Annette Brooke. Annette Brooke knows what it takes to be a good MP. She has represented our area for over a decade and has received national recognition for her hard work. “Vikki is someone I would be proud to call my MP. She is not in politics to beat other parties, she just cares passionately for our area. She would be a wonderful MP,” says Annette.

endorsements.endorsement: “Vikki is the best candidate for our area,” Annette Brooke. Annette Brooke knows what it takes to be a good MP. She has represented our area for over a decade and has received national recognition for her hard work. “Vikki is someone I would be proud to call my MP. She is not in politics to beat other parties, she just cares passionately for our area. She would be a wonderful MP,” says Annette.

quotes.text: Only the Liberal Democrats can offer both a stronger economy and a fairer society.

images.caption: Vikki Slade with Liberal Democrat members
Vikki Slade in a residential area

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vikki Slade and the Liberal Democrats will balance the budget by 2018, cut taxes for ordinary workers and bring back control of our borders. The Liberal Democrats entered government in order to clean up the mess left by the last Labour government. Now unemployment is down, 1.9 million new jobs have been created and a record number of people are in work.
